title: Multiple nodes secure deploy
description:
Add the ability to deploy multiple elasticsearch nodes to the role. It is also necessary to ensure the safe interaction of nodes with each other, as described here: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/7.17/configuring-stack-security.html ?blade=kibanasecuritymessage

It is possible to partially reuse this role when implementing secure interaction: https://github.com/elastic/ansible-elasticsearch
